sentences.en: Assault . Grand theft auto . Impersonating an officer . Mayhem . Theft . Resisting.
sentences.cn: 指伤人、偷车、假扮警察、故意伤害、偷窃、拒捕罪行.

sentences.en: But we've always stopped short of causing real mayhem,'said Fred.
sentences.cn: “不过我们总能在造成大伤害的时候煞住, ” 弗雷德说.

sentences.en: Experts fear the mayhem may soon trigger a chain reaction within the euro zone itself.
sentences.cn: 专家们担心,这场混乱可能很快在欧元区内触发连锁反应.

sentences.en: If a slushy romance is screened, the thugs go to the pub instead and mayhem ensues.
sentences.cn: 如果电影院里放映的是多愁善感的爱情片, 暴徒们反而会去俱乐部,混乱就会随之发生.

sentences.en: Imagine the mayhem he'll give the enemy, huh.
sentences.cn: 你想他会带给敌人怎样的灾害, 呵呵.

sentences.en: It is the [ Russian ] cossacks and the Ossetians that are causing mayhem.
sentences.cn: 他说,俄军自己并未参与周三的抢劫,是 哥萨克 人和奥塞梯人导致了这场浩劫.

sentences.en: It was a period of collective insanity, of legalized murder and mayhem.
sentences.cn: 那是个集体丧失理智、谋杀与暴力合法化的时期。

sentences.en: Ride with The Annoying Thing in a high octane riot through cityscapes and underground mayhem.
sentences.cn: 在这让人烦恼的高速竞赛游戏中穿过城市景观和避免地下伤害.

sentences.en: The escape of the monkeys from their cage created mayhem in the zoo.
sentences.cn: 猴子从笼中逃了出来,在动物园里造成了大混乱.

sentences.en: The kids began to create mayhem in the garden.
sentences.cn: 孩子们开始在花园里大肆破坏.

sentences.en: The mayhem spread to other parts of the city.
sentences.cn: 严重的混乱蔓延至了城市的其他地区.

sentences.en: Their arrival caused mayhem as crowds of refugees rushed towards them.
sentences.cn: 他们到达后大批难民一拥而上，引起一片混乱。

sentences.en: There was absolute mayhem when the cow got into the village hall.
sentences.cn: 那牛闯进村会议厅,造成一片混乱.

sentences.en: There was complete mayhem after the explosion.
Three competing store owners rented adjoining shops in a mall. Observers waited for mayhem to ensue.
sentences.cn: 三个互相争生意的商店老板在一条林荫道上租用了毗邻的店铺. 旁观者等着瞧好戏.

sentences.en: Would you like to take another question or spin the Wheel of Mayhem?
sentences.cn: 你要再回答一题或旋转处罚轮?

trans.tran_en: an extremely confused situation in which people are very frightened or excited
